augBlueprint.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR
augBlueprint.title: Scrap Arm [M]
augBlueprint.desc:
Allows the ship to collect 10% more scrap from any source.
	
	[M] - As a modular arm upgrade, it does not take up your ship's arm slot and can stack with whichever arm you choose. It cannot however be internalized like external [X] augments.

augBlueprint.name: MAGNET_ARM
augBlueprint.title: Magnetic Arm [M]
augBlueprint.desc:
A modified scrap recovery arm, which is short range and only collects scrap as effectively as your own crew, but much faster. Useful for time-sensitive situations, allowing you to salvage supplies in Rebel fleet controlled beacons and empty beacons.
	
	[M] - As a modular arm upgrade, it does not take up your ship's arm slot and can stack with a different arm. It cannot however be internalized like external [X] augments.

augBlueprint.name: DRONE_RECOVERY
augBlueprint.title: Drone Arm [M]
augBlueprint.desc:
Non-destroyed Combat and Defense drones will be retrieved when jumping, allowing their parts to be reused.
	
	[M] - As a modular arm upgrade, it does not take up your ship's arm slot and can stack with a different arm. It cannot however be internalized like external [X] augments.

augBlueprint.name: REPAIR_ARM
augBlueprint.title: Repair Arm [M]
augBlueprint.desc:
Repairs your hull every time you collect scrap, but reduces scrap collected by 10%. Will not take scrap when your hull is at full capacity.
	
	[M] - As a modular arm upgrade, it does not take up your ship's arm slot and can stack with a different arm. It cannot however be internalized like external [X] augments.

augBlueprint.desc: All of your systems and your hull gain a 10% chance to resist damage.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_TEMPORAL
augBlueprint.title: Grant of Time
augBlueprint.desc: All of your crew move twice as fast.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_DRONES
augBlueprint.title: Grant of Drones
augBlueprint.desc: Crew repair your drone control 75% faster.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_DOORS
augBlueprint.title: Grant of Doors
augBlueprint.desc: Crew gain 30% damage resistance in the doors room and enemy crew sabotage your doors 50% slower.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_PILOT
augBlueprint.title: Grant of Piloting
augBlueprint.desc: Crew are immune to mind control in the piloting room.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_BATTERY
augBlueprint.title: Grant of Battery
augBlueprint.desc: When your backup battery is disabled your crew gain a bonus 33% repair and movement speed.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_CRYSTALELITE
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Crystals
augBlueprint.desc: You have a 15% chance of breaking off a crystal shard each time you take damage.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_NEWGEN
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Generations
augBlueprint.desc: All crew you get will start at lvl 1 skills.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_AETHER
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Aether
augBlueprint.desc: Ruin beacons show on the map.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_SPECIAL
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Speciality
augBlueprint.desc: Weapons charge 5% faster.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_TRANSPORT
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Transports
augBlueprint.desc: Enemy FTLs charge at half speed.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_MATH
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Mathematics
augBlueprint.desc: All of your crew gain a 4% boost to their health and repair speed for each crew member you have.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_RENEGADE
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Renegades
augBlueprint.desc: You may avoid fighting any Renegade for free, regular or cruiser.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_CURA
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Tasks
augBlueprint.desc: C.U.R.A. will not charge you the next run.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_SENTRY
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Sentries
augBlueprint.desc: Your allied crew and drones will gain a 30% damage and movement speed boost while aboard the enemy ship.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_GATLING
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Super Weapons
augBlueprint.desc: Weapons charge 10% faster.

augBlueprint.name: JUDGE_BOON_MADNESS
augBlueprint.title: Blessing of Poets
augBlueprint.desc: Inflicts madness on enemy boarders.

augBlueprint.name: OBSIDIAN_ARMOR_1
augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
[Level 1] Grants 5% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
[Level 2] Grants 10% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
[Level 3] Grants 15% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

[Level 4] Grants 20% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

[Level 7] Grants 35% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

[Level 8] Grants 40% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.desc:
[Level 9] Grants 45% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.name: OBSIDIAN_ARMOR_10
augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
[Level 10] Grants 50% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor

[Level 11] Grants 60% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

[Level 12] Grants 70% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons to a max of 80%.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.name: OBSIDIAN_ARMOR_13
augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
[Level 13] Grants 80% chance to prevent hull or system damage. Can be upgraded at empty beacons with a special ability.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.name: OBSIDIAN_ARMOR_ION
augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
[Level MAX] Grants 80% chance to prevent hull or system damage, and 20% chance to ignore ion damage.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.name: OBSIDIAN_ARMOR_SYSTEM
augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
[Level MAX] Grants 80% chance to prevent hull or system damage, and 20% slowed sabotage speed on your systems.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.name: OBSIDIAN_ARMOR_SHARD
augBlueprint.title: Obsidian Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
[Level MAX] Grants 80% chance to prevent hull or system damage, and 40% chance to break off a heavy crystal shard when the hull is damaged.
	Cannot block the damage of projectiles or bombs with a guaranteed breach chance.

augBlueprint.name: FTL_JUMPER_GOOD
augBlueprint.title: Ultra Advanced Nav.
augBlueprint.desc: You shouldn't be seeing this yet.

augBlueprint.name: SECTOR_SCANNER
augBlueprint.title: Sector Scanner
augBlueprint.desc: Allows you to see the exact type of a sector even if it is not adjacent to the current one.

augBlueprint.name: BOARDER_RECOVERY
augBlueprint.title: Boarder Retro-Thrusters
augBlueprint.desc: Non-destroyed boarding drones will be retrieved at the end of combat.

augBlueprint.name: MIND_ORDER
augBlueprint.title: Neural Reins
augBlueprint.desc: Allows direct control of mind controlled enemy crew. Also takes ownership of any effects being applied by that crew.

augBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_ORDER
augBlueprint.title: Advanced Targeting
augBlueprint.desc: Allows manual targeting of artillery systems.

augBlueprint.name: TELEPORT_RECALL
augBlueprint.title: Personal Teleporters
augBlueprint.desc: Crew on an enemy ship that is jumping or being destroyed will be automatically recalled.

augBlueprint.name: FTL_JUMPER_SCANNER
augBlueprint.title: Advanced Navigator
augBlueprint.desc: Reveals details about surrounding beacons, and allows the ship to jump to any previously visited beacon.

augBlueprint.name: ADV_SCANNERS_CLOAK
augBlueprint.title: Advanced Sensor Suite
augBlueprint.desc: Reveals details about surrounding beacons. For each active level of sensors, weapons will charge while enemies are cloaked at a cumulative 25% speed, and fired projectiles will gain a cumulative 2.5% increase in accuracy.

augBlueprint.name: ASTROMETRICS
augBlueprint.title: Astrometric Mainframe
augBlueprint.desc: Allows you to reroute to your choice of four nearby sectors whenever you jump to a new sector.

augBlueprint.name: PECULIAR_GAS
augBlueprint.title: Peculiar Gas
augBlueprint.desc: A very strange variant of the Expeditive Gas which not only heals crew anywhere on the ship while Medbay is powered, but can also damage any type of crew. Extra concentrations of nanobots cause extra damage to crew in the Medbay.

augBlueprint.name: MULTIVERSE_DRIVE_GOOD
augBlueprint.title: Aether Drive
augBlueprint.desc:
An Aether powered FTL Drive recovered from precursor wreckage, using technology that isn't possible on most planes of reality.
		
Allows you to jump to any beacon, regardless of if it has been visited before for 1 fuel and makes your FTL drive charge much faster. However, due to the experimental nature of the augment, will cause 1 damage to your hull and engines every jump.

augBlueprint.name: MULTIVERSE_DRIVE
augBlueprint.title: Replica A-Drive
augBlueprint.desc: A reverse engineered copy of an Aether Drive. Allows you to jump to any beacon, regardless of if it has been visited before. Costs 3 fuel to jump to any non-adjacent beacon.

augBlueprint.name: EX_PAYLOAD_CREATOR
augBlueprint.title: Payload Fabricator [X]
augBlueprint.desc:
Allows you to fabricate multiple Magnetic Payload augments for the price of 15 scrap and 4 missiles at empty beacons.
	
	[X] - As an external system upgrade, this augment will provide its normal effect but take up an augment slot. Can be converted for free to the internal version under the internal upgrade menu.

augBlueprint.name: ATM_MACHINE
augBlueprint.title: Busted ATM
augBlueprint.desc: A beaten up ATM machine that grants 2 scrap every time you make a jump. Does not trigger the effects of Repair or Scrap arms.

augBlueprint.name: INFINITE_BEANS
augBlueprint.title: Bean Portal
augBlueprint.desc: An Obelisk Reality Manipulator tuned to pull cans of beans from other realities. If Sylvan Prime is aboard, he can convert them back to Sylvan.

augBlueprint.name: EXTRA_LIFE
augBlueprint.title: Emergency Protocols
augBlueprint.desc: In the case of imminent catastrophic hull failure at less than 3 hull, will trigger emergency protocols that will immediately repair the hull back to full and replenish fuel, missile, and drone part supplies. Will only trigger once before being depleted. Will not save you if your hull instantly reaches 0.

augBlueprint.name: MODULAR_STORE
augBlueprint.title: Hektar Virtual Store(tm)
augBlueprint.desc: Hektar Industries(tm) introduces the Hektar Virtual Store Interface(tm)! Remotely access Hektar's vast stock of modules and modular weapons, purchase a blueprint, and print it aboard your own ship with the included Hektar 3D Fabrication technology(tm)! Prices include those required for the raw materials needed for fabrication.

augBlueprint.name: SUICIDE_BUTTON
augBlueprint.title: Dead Man's Switch
augBlueprint.desc: Can be activated before combat at the price of 5 missiles, dealing 15 damage to both you and the enemy.

augBlueprint.name: EMERGENCY_DRIVE
augBlueprint.title: Secondary Impulse-Drive
augBlueprint.desc:
Allows you to spend 6 fuel to immediately escape a fight and outrun the fleet by 2 jumps.
		
Each Engine upgrade past level 4 will reduce the fuel cost by 1. However, due to instability, every 5 damage you take at a beacon will cause fires to start onboard.

augBlueprint.name: SUPER_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Steel Plating
augBlueprint.desc: Special adaptive plating that has a 25% chance to protect your systems or hull from all forms of damage. Also gives 10% ion resistance.

augBlueprint.name: EQUINOID_DUPLICATOR
augBlueprint.title: Stables
augBlueprint.desc: Allows you to breed two tamed equinoids to create a new, untamed equinoid for free at empty beacons.

augBlueprint.name: STORY_TELLER
augBlueprint.title: The Story Teller
augBlueprint.desc: The ever present Separatist who ensures the protection of all equinoids. Will manually control and repair the ship even in the absence of crew, and do massive damage to boarders while also quickly repairing breaches and putting out fires.

augBlueprint.name: SOLAR_PANELS
augBlueprint.title: Solar Panels
augBlueprint.desc: Allows you to generate extra fuel with solar energy. You can use this at empty beacons to find a star to generate fuel and missiles, at the risk of starting fires on your ship.

augBlueprint.name: FLEET_LURE
augBlueprint.title: Rebel Lure
augBlueprint.desc: Can be used to detect Elite Rebel ships which you can seek and destroy. However, doing so will also boost the Rebel fleet by 1 jump.

augBlueprint.name: GOLD_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Golden Plating
augBlueprint.desc: Surprisingly resistant golden plating that has a 15% chance to ignore hull damage. Also allows you to take apart a portion of the hull at empty beacons for extra scrap.

augBlueprint.name: SCRAP_HULL
augBlueprint.title: All Consuming Greed
augBlueprint.desc: Scrap gains are reduced by 50%, but the hull can be repaired for free before combat.

augBlueprint.name: GHOST_SPAWNER
augBlueprint.title: Occult Portal
augBlueprint.desc: A damaged piece of ancient tech that can reach through space and time to retrieve lifeforms from other realities. Seems only able to lock onto Ghosts for now...

augBlueprint.name: ZOLTAN_SPAWNER
augBlueprint.title: Cryo-Storage
augBlueprint.desc: Allows you to unthaw more Osmian crew at empty beacons at the expense of 5 fuel.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_GLOBAL_TELEPORT
augBlueprint.title: Centralized Teleporter
augBlueprint.desc: All crew can teleport from your ship to the enemy regardless where they are. However, they cannot teleport back during combat.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_SHIP_TELEPORT
augBlueprint.title: Personal Teleporters
augBlueprint.desc: While aboard your own ship, any allied crew can teleport anywhere on the ship from any marked system as long as it is powered.

augBlueprint.name: SLUG_DUPLICATOR
augBlueprint.title: Pleasure Pods
augBlueprint.desc: A secluded place for two members of a species to "Form a union" and to use cloning technology to create a "Child" who is aged just enough to be able to work. Also come equipped with a stereo system that plays R&B music 24/7.

augBlueprint.name: SLUG_DUPLICATOR_GHOST
augBlueprint.title: Haunted Pods
augBlueprint.desc: A modified pod that not only functions like standard Pleasure Pods, but also lets you summon any of the Alpha Ghost variants at the expense of 2 fuel if you have none of that type on your ship.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_XENOPHOBIA
augBlueprint.title: Xenophobia
augBlueprint.desc:
Your crew might be working for the Federation now, but they still carry with them their old Rebel prejudice. Human crew gain a 33% buff to all main stats, but alien crew have a 40% loss to all main stats.
	(Main stats include health, damage, repair, sabotage, and movement speed).

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_NEWORDER
augBlueprint.title: New Order
augBlueprint.desc:
Though they may be ex-Duskbringers, your crew still have some of their old Zoltan supremacist values. Zoltan crew provide 1 extra power and have 1.5x repair speed and combat damage, but all other crew have a 40% loss to all main stats. Duskbringer teleporters also allow them to teleport across ships.
	(Main stats include health, damage, repair, sabotage, and movement speed).

augBlueprint.name: MEDBAY_DEFENSE
augBlueprint.title: Utility-Bot Dispersal
augBlueprint.desc: Dispenses nanobots that both heal your crew when the Medbay is powered as well as damage enemy boarders.

augBlueprint.name: CURA_SURGES_DRONES
augBlueprint.title: Surge Controller
augBlueprint.desc:
Allows you to reroute power to control various levels of power surges. The more power, the stronger the surges will become. Can be powered with an Emergency Generator.
	
	Surge type: DRONE SWARM [spawns in a temporary swarm of combat drones]

augBlueprint.name: CURA_SURGES_FIRE
augBlueprint.title: Surge Controller
augBlueprint.desc:
Allows you to reroute power to control various levels of power surges. The more power, the stronger the surges will become. Can be powered with an Emergency Generator.
	
	Surge type: FIRESTORM [rains superheated plasma on the enemy that start fires, damage systems, and pierce 2 shields]

augBlueprint.name: CURA_SURGES_DAMAGE
augBlueprint.title: Surge Controller
augBlueprint.desc:
Allows you to reroute power to control various levels of power surges. The more power, the stronger and more unstable the surges will become. Can be powered with an Emergency Generator.
	
	Surge type: MELTDOWN [deals heavy self damage but creates bursts of heavy radiation via 2 damage beams, with 1 shield pierce]

augBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_ARMOR_100
augBlueprint.title: Shatter Armor
augBlueprint.desc: Contrary to the usual purpose of armor, this plating is extremely fragile. It'll break off into 2 smaller shards every time it is hit, though they can only pierce 2 shields each. Your hull will also take an additional point of damage when hit by a damaging weapon.

augBlueprint.name: STORE_BEACON_SYLVAN
augBlueprint.title: Nexus Beacon
augBlueprint.desc: Opens a rift directly to the Nexus, allowing you to trade for high value items. Can be used only at empty beacons, and does not impact the fleet.

augBlueprint.name: GATLING_MAKER
augBlueprint.title: Rift Forge
augBlueprint.desc: A special device which can upgrade a Chain Laser all the way into a weapon of ultimate destruction - assuming you can fork over enough resources for it.

augBlueprint.name: STORE_BEACON_SUPER
augBlueprint.title: Wallace Beacon
augBlueprint.desc: A direct contact with the infamous space-time criminal Wallace, who'll sell you just about anything for the right price.

augBlueprint.name: SYLVAN_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Merchant's Shield
augBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_SYLVAN_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Merchant's Shield
augBlueprint.desc: A strangely resistant shield powered by several massive Aether batteries with an integrity of 12 hitpoints.

augBlueprint.name: SYLVAN_SHIELD_REWARD
augBlueprint.title: Merchant's Shield
augBlueprint.desc: A strangely resistant shield powered by several massive Aether batteries with an integrity of 12 hitpoints, formerly utilized by the Traveling Merchant.

augBlueprint.name: SYLVAN_SHIELD_CONTINUITY
augBlueprint.title: Adv. Merchant's Shield
augBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_SYLVAN_SHIELD_CONTINUITY
augBlueprint.title: Adv. Merchant's Shield
augBlueprint.desc: A strangely resistant shield powered by several massive Aether batteries with an integrity of 15 hitpoints.

augBlueprint.name: SYLVAN_SHIELD_PRIME
augBlueprint.title: Prime Shield
augBlueprint.desc: A strangely resistant shield powered by several massive Aether batteries with an integrity of 20 hitpoints.

augBlueprint.name: CHUNGUS_MAKER
augBlueprint.title: Chungus Maker
augBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS - makes crew very heavy

augBlueprint.name: CREW_STIMS_ULTRA
augBlueprint.title: Clansman Stolen Pheromones
augBlueprint.desc: I am speed.

augBlueprint.name: FLAGSHIP_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Flagship Shield
augBlueprint.desc: Very powerful Energy Shield.

augBlueprint.name: FLAGSHIP_SHIELD_FULL
augBlueprint.title: Flagship Shield
augBlueprint.desc: Very powerful Energy Shield.

augBlueprint.name: SYSTEM_UNBREAKING
augBlueprint.title: Immortal Systems
augBlueprint.desc: Your systems cannot break.

augBlueprint.name: HULL_UNBREAKING
augBlueprint.title: Immortal Hull
augBlueprint.desc: Your hull cannot break.

augBlueprint.name: ENEMY_RESIST_50
augBlueprint.title: 50% Hull Resist
augBlueprint.desc: Your hull has a 50% resist chance.

augBlueprint.name: NO_GHOST
augBlueprint.title: Emancipation Grid
augBlueprint.desc:
Reduces Ghost sabotage speed by 20%.
	If a Door Control system is present and functional, all enemy crew and drones on-board will lose 4hp/s with an extra 1hp/s for each level of Door Control above 1.

augBlueprint.name: NO_SUFFOCATE
augBlueprint.title: Can't suffocate.
augBlueprint.desc: All enemy crew are immune to suffocation aboard their ship.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_UNION_JACKETS
augBlueprint.title: Lifejackets
augBlueprint.desc: When crew are below half health, they gain doubled healing, movement and door breaking speed, and take half damage from hazards.

augBlueprint.name: UNION_JACKETS
augBlueprint.title: Lifejackets
augBlueprint.desc: When crew are below half health, they gain doubled healing, movement and door breaking speed, and take half damage from hazards.

augBlueprint.name: ROCK_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Rock Plating
augBlueprint.desc:
Superior hull armor provides a 17% chance to negate incoming hull damage (hit systems will still be damaged).
	Provides an opportunity to ram the enemy ship before combat as well.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_ROCK_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Rock Plating
augBlueprint.desc:
Superior hull armor provides a 20% chance to negate incoming hull damage (hit systems will still be damaged).
	Provides an opportunity to ram the enemy ship before combat as well.

augBlueprint.name: PALADIN_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Divine Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
Extremely strong armor reinforced with Aether harvested from precursor ruins, fused with the already resistant armor of the Rockmen. Impacts that deal 1 damage have a 40% chance to be negated, and all other damage is reduced by 1.
	Provides an opportunity to ram the enemy ship before combat as well.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_PALADIN_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Divine Armor
augBlueprint.desc:
Extremely strong armor reinforced with Aether harvested from precursor ruins, fused with the already resistant armor of the Rockmen. Incoming projectiles that deal 1 damage have a 40% chance to be negated, and all other damage is reduced by 1.
	Provides an opportunity to ram the enemy ship before combat as well.

augBlueprint.name: PALADIN_ARMOR_PLAYER
augBlueprint.title: Divine Armor+
augBlueprint.desc:
Extremely strong armor reinforced with Aether harvested from precursor ruins, fused with the already resistant armor of the Rockmen. Incoming projectiles that deal 2 or less damage have a 50% chance to be negated, and all other damage is reduced by 2.
	Provides an opportunity to ram the enemy ship before combat as well.

augBlueprint.name: SALT_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Salt Plating
augBlueprint.desc: Strange plating that can resist all ion damage and gives a very small chance for systems to resist damage.

augBlueprint.name: REGEN_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Regenerative Plating
augBlueprint.desc:
An advanced Lost Sun creation, a superior hull plating which not only protects the hull, but patches breaches automatically. Grants 10% chance to resist hull damage.
Provides an opportunity to ram the enemy ship before combat as well.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_REGEN_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Regenerative Plating
augBlueprint.desc:
An advanced Lost Sun creation, a superior hull plating which not only protects the hull, but patches breaches automatically. Grants 10% chance to resist hull damage.
Provides an opportunity to ram the enemy ship before combat as well.

augBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_ARMOR_ENEMY
augBlueprint.title: Crystalline Armor
augBlueprint.desc: Every time your ship takes damage, there is a 33% chance to break off a shard that flies at your enemy.

augBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Crystalline Armor
augBlueprint.desc: Every time your ship takes damage, there is a 75% chance to break off a shard that flies at your enemy which pierces all shields.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_CRYSTAL_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Crystalline Armor
augBlueprint.desc: Every time your ship takes damage, there is a 75% chance to break off a shard that flies at your enemy which pierces all shields.

augBlueprint.name: ENERGY_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Zoltan Shield
augBlueprint.desc: Advanced hard-light technology creates this nearly impenetrable shield. Only the energy outburst from an FTL engine is powerful enough to recharge it.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_ENERGY_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Zoltan Shield
augBlueprint.desc: Advanced hard-light technology creates this nearly impenetrable shield. Only the energy outburst from an FTL engine is powerful enough to recharge it.

augBlueprint.name: OSMIAN_BATTERIES
augBlueprint.title: Overfield
augBlueprint.desc:
Repurposed Aether technology from the traditional Zoltan shields, which instead reroutes power across the ship.
	
	Provides a 50% chance to resist ion damage, a 50% reduction to stun duration on your own ship, and increases the maximum number of charges and charges gained per jump your crew members' active abilities have by 2.

augBlueprint.name: SLUG_GEL
augBlueprint.title: Slug Repair Gel
augBlueprint.desc:
Slug ships excrete a thick gel that repairs breaches and coats the inside of empty rooms, providing 35% combat resistance and 50% hazard and stun resistance to allied crew inside them.
Also provides a cheaper option for repairs at empty beacons.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_SLUG_GEL
augBlueprint.title: Slug Repair Gel
augBlueprint.desc:
Slug ships excrete a thick gel that repairs breaches and coats the inside of empty rooms, providing 35% combat resistance and 50% hazard and stun resistance to allied crew inside them.
Also provides a cheaper option for repairs at empty beacons.

augBlueprint.name: HEKTAR_GEL
augBlueprint.title: Hektar Ultra-Stick Gel(tm)
augBlueprint.desc:
REVOLUTIONARY brand new variant of Slug Repair Gel produced exclusively by Hektar Industries(tm) with a little bit of lizard mixed in to give it that signature aroma. 
	
	All crew move 20% slower in empty rooms, but allies take 50% less damage from all sources in them and also benefit from 50% stun resistance.
	Also provides a cheaper option for repairs at empty beacons.

augBlueprint.name: PLEASURE_GEL
augBlueprint.title: Suspicious Gel
augBlueprint.desc:
You're pretty sure this is Repair Gel... but you can't really be certain. 
	
	All crew move 20% slower in empty rooms, but allies take 50% less damage from all sources in them and also benefit from 50% stun resistance.
	Also provides a cheaper option for repairs at empty beacons.

augBlueprint.name: CREW_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Pheromone Dispersal
augBlueprint.desc: Strength inducing pheromones that are dispersed through the Life Support system, with their effects persisting even on the enemy ship. Each powered level provides an additional 25% boost to movement and a 6.25% boost to Max Health.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_CREW_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Pheromone Dispersal
augBlueprint.desc: Strength inducing pheromones that are dispersed through the Life Support system, with their effects persisting even on the enemy ship. Each powered level provides an additional 25% boost to movement and a 6.25% boost to Max Health.

augBlueprint.name: SUPER_CREW_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Synthesized Pheromones
augBlueprint.desc: Special pheromones concocted by the Free Mantis, with their effects persisting even on the enemy ship. Each level of the Life Support system that is powered provides a 15% combat damage boost, but for each level above 1 also reduces repair speed by 25%.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_SUPER_CREW_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Synthesized Pheromones
augBlueprint.desc: Special pheromones concocted by the Free Mantis, with their effects persisting even on the enemy ship. Each level of the Life Support system that is powered provides a 15% combat damage boost, but for each level above 1 also reduces repair speed by 25%.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_ELITE_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Big Vibe Pheromones
augBlueprint.desc: The strongest concoction ever brewed by the Free Mantis, for the biggest of vibes. Provides the same bonuses as regular Synthesized Pheromones, and increases the duration of all Free Mantis pheromone abilities by 100%. However, the debilitating effects of the pheromones cause all non-Free Mantis crew to take twice as long to charge abilities, and lose 25% Max Health. Hive Mantis crew become addicted and transform into Free Mantis.

augBlueprint.name: SUZERAIN_CREW_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Suzerain Pheromones
augBlueprint.desc: Strength inducing pheromones that are dispersed through the Life Support system, with their effects persisting even on the enemy ship. Each powered level reduces active ability cooldowns by 15% and increases movement speed by 33%.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_SUZERAIN_CREW_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Suzerain Pheromones
augBlueprint.desc: Strength inducing pheromones that are dispersed through the Life Support system, with their effects persisting even on the enemy ship. Each powered level reduces active ability cooldowns by 15% and increases movement speed by 33%.

augBlueprint.name: KERNEL_REPLICATOR
augBlueprint.title: Kernel Greenhouse
augBlueprint.desc:
A small on-board greenhouse for growing kernel ammunition. Gives a 65% chance to not use ammunition when a missile consuming weapon is fired, and lets you recover 1 fuel for every sector transition.

Effect stack multiplicatively with weapons replication chance.
Overwrites the bonus of Explosive Replicator.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_KERNEL_REPLICATOR
augBlueprint.title: Kernel Greenhouse
augBlueprint.desc:
A small on-board greenhouse for growing kernel ammunition. Gives a 65% chance to not use ammunition when a missile consuming weapon is fired, and lets you recover 1 fuel for every sector transition.

Overwrites the bonus of Explosive Replicator.

augBlueprint.name: CARETAKER_BUFF
augBlueprint.title: Organic Rebreathers
augBlueprint.desc: Aerobic crew suffocation damage is reduced by 45% for every Orchid on your crew, regardless of which ship they're on.

augBlueprint.name: PRAETOR_BUFF
augBlueprint.title: Spore Reserves
augBlueprint.desc: An extra reserve of lingering spores for your Praetors, allowing them to use their ability twice every jump.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_WOOD_PLATING
augBlueprint.title: Titanwood Hull
augBlueprint.desc: An ultrastrong hull plating forged from titanwood, which provides a 50% chance to resist hull damage. However, repairs are slowed by 60%.

augBlueprint.name: WOOD_PLATING
augBlueprint.title: Titanwood Hull
augBlueprint.desc: An ultrastrong hull plating forged from titanwood, which provides a 50% chance to resist hull damage. However, repairs are slowed by 60%.

augBlueprint.name: SPORE_AIR_TOXIC
augBlueprint.title: Spore Dispensary [T]
augBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Toxic] Floods the ship with either toxic or rejuvenating spores.
	Toxic - Enemy crew on your ship move 20% slower and take 20% more damage from ALL sources.
	Rejuvenating - Allied crew on your ship have 10% more health and move 20% faster. If a Medbay is present, they also regain 1hp/s.

augBlueprint.name: SPORE_AIR_BUFF
augBlueprint.title: Spore Dispensary [R]
augBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Rejuvenating] Floods the ship with either toxic or rejuvenating spores.
	Toxic - Enemy crew on your ship move 20% slower and take 20% more damage from ALL sources.
	Rejuvenating - Allied crew on your ship have 10% more health and move 20% faster. If a Medbay is present, they also regain 1hp/s.

augBlueprint.name: SPORE_AIR_ELITE
augBlueprint.title: Spore Redistributor
augBlueprint.desc: All Vampweeds you get on this ship will permanently become Cultivators. For every Cultivator aboard your ship, all non-Vampweed crew on your ship lose an additional 15% Max Health due to the potency of the spores distributed.

augBlueprint.name: SPORE_AIR_STRONG
augBlueprint.title: Overflowing Spores
augBlueprint.desc:
Excess spores seep into the air, making it unbreathable for most crew types. ALL crew, friend or foe, will periodically lose health aboard your ship, with the exception of Shells, Orchids, Lanius and Ghosts.
Enemies will lose 5hp/s, allies will lose 2hp/s.

augBlueprint.name: SPORE_SHIPMENT
augBlueprint.title: Valuable Spores
augBlueprint.desc:
Extra valuable shipment of spores. You will gain 5 scrap every jump (not affected by Scrap/Repair arms), but all of your crew have 25% less Max Health.
ALL crew, friend or foe, will lose 5hp/s aboard your ship, with the exception of Shells, Orchids, Lanius and Ghosts.

augBlueprint.name: MORPH_DATABASE
augBlueprint.title: DNA Samples
augBlueprint.desc:
A database of various DNA samplings, which your Morphs can use to transform into any of the included species. DNA Samples may be used any number of times.
	Can also be used to synthesize a Morph during jumpspeed for free.

augBlueprint.name: MORPH_DATABASE_ADV
augBlueprint.title: Genetic Codex
augBlueprint.desc: An advanced database of all things Morph related. Enables your Morphs to copy a wider variety of species than standard DNA Samples. Can be used to synthesize a variety of Morph types at empty beacons. Also allows for rapid Morph synthesization pre-combat, or producing a large number of Morphs for free during jumpspeed.

augBlueprint.name: TOXIC_GAS
augBlueprint.title: Toxic Gas
augBlueprint.desc:
An odorous and very unpleasant gas that acts like a neurotoxin. Damages enemy boarders at a rate of 6hp/s.
	
Drones and the following species will be immune to the damage of the augment:
Shells, Vampweeds, Lanius, Ghosts.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_TOXIC_GAS
augBlueprint.title: Toxic Gas
augBlueprint.desc:
An odorous and very unpleasant gas that acts like a neurotoxin. Damages enemy boarders at a rate of 6hp/s.
	
Drones and the following species will be immune to the damage of the augment:
Shells, Vampweeds, Lanius, Ghosts.

augBlueprint.name: RADIANT_GAS
augBlueprint.title: Botulinum Gas
augBlueprint.desc:
An incredibly deadly and fast-working neurotoxin that will greatly harm most hostile crew on your ship at a rate of 18hp/s.
	
Drones and the following species will be immune to the damage of the augment:
Shells, Vampweeds, Lanius, Ghosts.

augBlueprint.name: NANITE_GAS
augBlueprint.title: Nanite Gas
augBlueprint.desc:
A specialized gas formula mixed with nanites that flood through the ventilation, actively putting out fires and sealing breaches. Also damages enemy boarders at a rate of 3hp/s.
	
Drones and the following species will be immune to the damage of the augment:
Shells, Vampweeds, Lanius, Ghosts.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_NANITE_GAS
augBlueprint.title: Nanite Gas
augBlueprint.desc:
A specialized gas formula mixed with nanites that flood through the ventilation, actively putting out fires and sealing breaches. Also damages enemy boarders at a rate of 3hp/s.
	
Drones and the following species will be immune to the damage of the augment:
Shells, Vampweeds, Lanius, Ghosts.

augBlueprint.name: REGEN_GAS
augBlueprint.title: Expeditive Gas
augBlueprint.desc:
This odd formula of Shell gas carries the nano-medbots from the Medbay around the ship, allowing the effects of the Medbay to spread anywhere on the ship at 90% efficiency of level 1 Medbay. Also damages enemy boarders at a rate of 3hp/s.
	
Drones and the following species will be immune to the damage of the augment:
Shells, Vampweeds, Lanius, Ghosts.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_REGEN_GAS
augBlueprint.title: Expeditive Gas
augBlueprint.desc:
This odd formula of Shell gas carries the nano-medbots from the Medbay around the ship, allowing the effects of the Medbay to spread anywhere on the ship at 90% efficiency of level 1 Medbay. Also damages enemy boarders at a rate of 3hp/s.
	
Drones and the following species will be immune to the damage of the augment:
Shells, Vampweeds, Lanius, Ghosts.

augBlueprint.name: REPAIR_HULL
augBlueprint.title: Assimilative Plating
augBlueprint.desc: Absorbs 10% of scrap into the hull, repairing it. Will not take scrap when your hull is at full capacity.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_COAL_AUG
augBlueprint.title: R.U.E.S. Plating
augBlueprint.desc: A very powerful set of plating which combines all effects of Rock Plating, Mantis Pheromones, and Slug Repair Gel.

augBlueprint.name: ANTICOAL_AUG
augBlueprint.title: Alliance Energy Field
augBlueprint.desc: A peculiar set of batteries integrated into the ship plating, granting 3 stacking points of Energy Shield. When the hull is damaged, has 40% chance of releasing Energy projectiles. Additionally empowers your crew's combat damage by 15%.

augBlueprint.name: ANTICOAL_AUG_CHAOS
augBlueprint.title: Chaotic Alliance Plating
augBlueprint.desc: A peculiar set of batteries integrated into the ship's plating, granting 3 stacking points of Energy Shield. Chaotic energy causes the hull to fire back random projectiles whenever damaged. Additionally empowers crew damage by 30% per Life Support level above 1 power, but applies a 15% combat damage penalty when Life Support is disabled or uninstalled.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_PREIGNITE
augBlueprint.title: Ancient Hyper-Igniter
augBlueprint.desc: Specialized Pre-Igniter tech that not only pre-ignites weapons, but also improves their fire rate by 15%.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_REPLICATOR
augBlueprint.title: Ancient Recycler
augBlueprint.desc: Remarkable ammunition replication system that synthesizes warheads for your missile weapons using left-over scrap. Nullifies the ammo cost of weapons, but reduces scrap gain by 15%.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_PROTECTANT
augBlueprint.title: Ancient Protocols
augBlueprint.desc: All encompassing hazard-handling security system, which provides 40% chance to resist system damage, and reduces suffocation damage aboard your ship by 50%. However, due to the complexity of the algorithms, repair speed is 20% slower.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_DNA
augBlueprint.title: Ancient Cybernetics
augBlueprint.desc: Advanced cybernetics forged from Aether. Non-mechanical crew gain an extra 50% resistance to fire and suffocation, and +33% Max Health. However, the foreign implants also slow the passive healing speed of affected crew by 33%.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Aether Shields
augBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS

augBlueprint.name: ROYAL_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Ascended Shields
augBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_SHIELD_PLAYER
augBlueprint.title: Aether Shields
augBlueprint.desc: Extremely powerful shielding powered by Aether batteries. Unlike standard Energy Shields, it has an integrity of 7 hitpoints, and boosts standard shield charge rate by 20%.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_ANCIENT_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Aether Shields
augBlueprint.desc: Extremely powerful shielding powered by Aether batteries. Unlike standard Energy Shields, it has an integrity of 7 hitpoints, and boosts standard shield charge rate by 20%.

augBlueprint.name: ROYAL_SHIELD_PLAYER
augBlueprint.title: Ascended Shields
augBlueprint.desc: Overcharged version of the Obelisks' signature Aether shielding. Has an integrity of 10 hitpoints, and boosts standard shield charge rate by 45%.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_ROYAL_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Ascended Shields
augBlueprint.desc: Overcharged version of the Obelisks' signature Aether shielding. Has an integrity of 10 hitpoints, and boosts standard shield charge rate by 45%.

augBlueprint.name: SIREN_ENEMY_MC
augBlueprint.title: Cosmetic Augment
augBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS - gives Siren slaves the mind control graphic.

augBlueprint.name: RHYME_SHIELDS
augBlueprint.title: Eldritch Shield
augBlueprint.desc: A barrier of chaotic energy that provides a 7 hitpoints Super Shield.

augBlueprint.name: RHYME_SHIELDS_B
augBlueprint.title: Eldritch Shield
augBlueprint.desc: A barrier of chaotic energy that provides a 7 hitpoints Super Shield.

augBlueprint.name: RHYME_SHIELDS_C
augBlueprint.title: Eldritch Shield
augBlueprint.desc: A barrier of chaotic energy that provides a 7 hitpoints Super Shield.

augBlueprint.name: CHAOS
augBlueprint.title: Chaotic Energy
augBlueprint.desc: Non-siren crew lose their active abilities while within chaotic energy fields.

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_PANIC_BUTTON
augBlueprint.title: PANIC BUTTON
augBlueprint.desc: A VERY STRANGE RED BUTTON INSTALLED ON YOUR SHIP BY SLUGS. A SMALL PLACARD UNDERNEATH SAYS IN ALL CAPS, "SATISFACTION GUARANTEED, BECAUSE YOU AREN'T GETTING YOUR MONEY BACK."

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_EXPLOSIVE
augBlueprint.title: Magnetic Payload
augBlueprint.desc: Single use combat augment that can be deployed before combat to deal 4 damage to an enemy system of your choice as well as against their hull.

augBlueprint.name: EXTRA_PREP
augBlueprint.title: Emergency Manual
augBlueprint.desc: A well structured guide on emergency procedures. Adds extra options to last minute preparations before combat to produce fuel, convert missiles and droneparts, or even detonate extra missiles to sabotage enemy weapons.

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_REPAIR
augBlueprint.title: Repair-Bot Dispersal
augBlueprint.desc:
These nanobots take ship parts dislodged from hostile vessels and convert it to metal to repair your hull at the start of ship combat in exchange for reactor power. More power means more bots are available to convert enemy parts.

Incompatible with Emergency Generator.

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_HAZARD
augBlueprint.title: Reality Manipulator
augBlueprint.desc: Only the Obelisks can understand how this strange and powerful device functions, but it is capable of manipulating reality to summon any hazard before combat.

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_IONSTORM
augBlueprint.title: Ionized Storm Exhaust
augBlueprint.desc: Can expel electrified nebulous gases to create an ion storm before any fight.

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_WEAPON_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: Targeting Jammer
augBlueprint.desc:
Jams the enemy targeting systems, weakening the enemy Weapon system by 2 bars. Does not work on Artillery.
	[Uses 2 power, 1 fuel, lasts 45 seconds]

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_SHIELDS_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: Shield Jammer
augBlueprint.desc:
Jams the enemy shield generator, weakening the enemy Shield system by 2 bars.
	[Uses 2 power, 1 fuel, lasts 45 seconds]

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_ENGINE_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: Engine Disabler
augBlueprint.desc:
Disables the enemy engines, weakening the enemy Engines system by 2 bars.
	[Uses 2 power, 1 fuel, lasts 45 seconds]

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_PILOT_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: Auto-Pilot Scrambler
augBlueprint.desc: Can be used to either disable enemy auto pilot for free, or completely shut off their evasion for 2 power.

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_CLOAKING_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: Tracking Flares
augBlueprint.desc:
Deploys an array of tracking flares that temporarily reveal the enemy, disabling their Cloaking system.
	[Uses 2 power, lasts 30 seconds]

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_WARP_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: Disruption Field
augBlueprint.desc:
Creates a protective field around the ship which can be tuned to protect against either enemy teleporter or mind control but not both at the same time.
	[Uses 2 power, lasts 30 seconds]

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_REACTOR_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: EMP Field
augBlueprint.desc:
Activates an EMP field which cripples the enemy reactor, but is quite heavy on your own. Will not work in an ion storm, or against the Flagship.
	[Uses 3 power and 1 fuel, lasts 45 seconds]

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_OXYGEN_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: Asphyxiator
augBlueprint.desc:
Cripples the enemy Life Support system. Uses more power for each system bar disabled.
	[Uses 3 to 5 power, infinite duration]
	[Note: The Emergency generator will only reduce power usage by 2]

augBlueprint.name: COMBAT_OXYGEN_UNSTABLE
augBlueprint.title: Viral Dispersion
augBlueprint.desc: A dangerous bio-engineered virus. Uses no power and reduces enemy and player Life Support power by 2.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_COMBAT_EQUALIZER
augBlueprint.title: Ancient Equalizer
augBlueprint.desc: Ancient combat augment that limits a system on both the enemy and player ship to either 0 or 1 bar depending on the system. The player must have the system being targeted.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_COMBAT_ASB
augBlueprint.title: Ancient ASB Platform
augBlueprint.desc:
A portable ASB platform that can be deployed before combat by spending a single drone part and fuel.

Incompatible with Emergency Generator.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_ACTIVATOR
augBlueprint.title: Ancient Activator
augBlueprint.desc: Can be used at an empty beacon to awaken the ancient in your cargo-bay.

augBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_CONSTRUCTOR
augBlueprint.title: Hibernating Robot
augBlueprint.desc: This strange machine is in a hibernating state. Perhaps someone will have more information about this.

augBlueprint.name: TULLY_PRESENT
augBlueprint.title: Tully's Package
augBlueprint.desc: A Federation supply crate given to you by Vice Admiral Adara. It's protected by several passcodes and a lock that requires a special magnetic key. A large Federation insignia is on the back.

augBlueprint.name: ZOLTAN_STATUE
augBlueprint.title: Monk Statue
augBlueprint.desc: A plastic statue painted gold depicting a Zoltan meditating. It appears to be something you could find in just about any tourist location.

augBlueprint.name: QUARP_JUICE
augBlueprint.title: Quarp Juice
augBlueprint.desc: You aren't sure how you feel about the crew drinking this, but they seem to like it. The almost lethal dose of sugar increases combat, repair, and movement speed by 75% for all crew but also lowers their Max Health by 25%.

augBlueprint.name: SMUGGLER_RAID_CARGO
augBlueprint.title: Mysterious Cargo
augBlueprint.desc: You managed to retrieve this from the smuggler's depot, now you just have to bring it back.

augBlueprint.name: NEBULA_GASSES
augBlueprint.title: Nebulous Gases
augBlueprint.desc: Rare and expensive nebula gases. Sells for 50 scrap.

augBlueprint.name: BEACON_PARTS
augBlueprint.title: Beacon Parts
augBlueprint.desc: Parts salvaged from a damaged beacon. Maybe you can give them to the Beacon Eater?

augBlueprint.name: ORCHID_KIDS
augBlueprint.title: Orchid Children
augBlueprint.desc: The corpses of dead Orchid children, though they merely resemble small flowers. You can sell them for scrap, at the cost of your soul, you monster.

augBlueprint.name: SLUG_NARCOTICS
augBlueprint.title: Slug Narcotics
augBlueprint.desc: A bundle of highly illegal drugs. Using them yourself is out of the question if you don't want to be comatose by the time you get to the Flagship, but you could sell these back for more than you got them, or use them to bribe Slugs out of fighting you. Has no use outside the Royal Nebula.

augBlueprint.name: LOSTSUN_BLESSING
augBlueprint.title: Blessed
augBlueprint.desc: You have been blessed by the Lost Suns. At empty beacons, you can hold a fire ritual to receive a reward.

augBlueprint.name: ZOLTAN_BLESSING
augBlueprint.title: Blessed
augBlueprint.desc: You have been blessed by the Zoltans. At empty beacons you can meditate, which takes a long time but will repair your hull.

augBlueprint.name: NO_GHOST_PLAYER
augBlueprint.title: Lightweight E-Grid
augBlueprint.desc:
Reduces Ghost sabotage speed by 20%.
	If a Door Control system is present and functional, all enemy crew and drones on-board will lose 2hp/s with an extra 0.5hp/s for each level of Door Control above 1.

augBlueprint.name: DEATH_VESTS
augBlueprint.title: Martyr Vests
augBlueprint.desc:
Adds a death effect to allied crew, making them explode for 15 crew damage against enemies, with a 50% chance to start fires.
	Stacks upon already existing death effects.

augBlueprint.name: WEAPON_PREIGNITE
augBlueprint.title: Weapon Pre-igniter
augBlueprint.desc: Weapons are made immediately available after an FTL jump.

augBlueprint.name: LOOT_COMPASS
augBlueprint.title: Hijacked Frequencies
augBlueprint.desc:
Detects and reveals the locations of Loot Transports and Guard Reinforcements when possible.
	Loot Transports are usually found in [!] Unique sectors.
	Guard Reinforcements spawn when a guard ship is killed.

augBlueprint.name: GAMBLING_MACHINE
augBlueprint.title: Gambling Machine
augBlueprint.desc: A machine designed for casinos. It appears to have been modified to be able to dispense a wide variety of items when you win, but you can't seem to figure out how to open it.

augBlueprint.name: PROTON_PACK
augBlueprint.title: Proton Pack
augBlueprint.desc: Allows you to track down Ghost vessels from a long running database and fight them for scrap.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_PROTON_PACK
augBlueprint.title: Proton Pack
augBlueprint.desc: Allows you to track down Ghost vessels from a long running database and fight them for scrap.

augBlueprint.name: MVBOSS_SPAWNER
augBlueprint.title: Drive Hacker
augBlueprint.desc: Can single out and hijack the MV drives of powerful Multiverse cruisers from other realities. Uses 7 fuel to do so, but can spawn any MV boss as a Quest. Always spawns them at Challenge difficulty scaling.

augBlueprint.name: FLEET_SKIP
augBlueprint.title: engin ovahrdrive capcitor mak free+
augBlueprint.desc:
Can be activated during hyperspeed to travel so insanely fast that you'll be put 3 jumps ahead of the Rebel fleet. Unfortunately, it's very unstable (and illegal), and will likely destroy your engines afterwards.
	Can only be used once.

augBlueprint.name: PANDORA_BOX
augBlueprint.title: Pandora's Box
augBlueprint.desc: A mystical square artifact with bright green lights and a dark black exterior. With it came a small card from the pirates, on it written "Open the box if you dare, but be warned. For as likely it is that it will grant you infinite power, it is just as likely to damn you."

augBlueprint.name: PANDORA_BOX_ANCIENT
augBlueprint.title: Pandora's Box
augBlueprint.desc: Also known as a Karthithe, this box holds both divine wonders and unimaginable horrors. Question is, which will be bestowed upon you if you open it?

augBlueprint.name: NANOBOT_DEFENSE_SYSTEM
augBlueprint.title: Murder-Bot Dispersal
augBlueprint.desc: Boarders take damage over time on your ship at a rate of 2.7hp/s. The name makes it sound a lot more violent than it is.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_NANOBOT_DEFENSE_SYSTEM
augBlueprint.title: Murder-Bot Dispersal
augBlueprint.desc: Boarders take damage over time on your ship at a rate of 2.7hp/s. The name makes it sound a lot more violent than it is.

augBlueprint.name: SYSTEM_CASING
augBlueprint.title: Titanium System Casing
augBlueprint.desc: All ship systems have additional plating that provides a 15 percent chance to negate damage when hit (YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS BY THE WAY)

augBlueprint.name: SYSTEM_CASING_NEW
augBlueprint.title: Titanium System Casing
augBlueprint.desc: Enemy boarders sabotage your systems at 40% speed. Also provides a 15% chance to resist damage to your systems.

augBlueprint.name: LOCKED_SYSTEM_CASING
augBlueprint.title: Titanium System Casing
augBlueprint.desc: Enemy boarders sabotage your systems at 40% speed. Also provides a 15% chance to resist damage to your systems.

augBlueprint.name: ADV_SCANNERS
augBlueprint.title: Long-Ranged Scanners
augBlueprint.desc: Adds additional info about nearby Beacons on the star map.

augBlueprint.name: RECYCLER
augBlueprint.title: Recycler Module
augBlueprint.desc: A recycler module similar to that used in Recycler tech weapons. Can be used to convert fuel, scrap, drone parts, or just random junk into missiles.

augBlueprint.name: RECYCLER_REVERSE
augBlueprint.title: Deconstructor
augBlueprint.desc: A special component that allows you to disassemble missiles or droneparts into scrap, at a greatly reduced yield.

augBlueprint.name: GHOST_DUPLICATOR
augBlueprint.title: Quick-Splitter TM
augBlueprint.desc: Patented GHOST DUPLICATING technology allows you to quickly and rapidly inflate Ghosts of any type, then force them to divide as if they were an Alpha. It's painless, we promise.

augBlueprint.name: STORE_BEACON
augBlueprint.title: Merchant Beacon
augBlueprint.desc: Can summon a store at any empty beacon at the cost of 1 fleet boost.

augBlueprint.name: DISTRACTION_BUOY
augBlueprint.title: Decoy Buoys
augBlueprint.desc: Allows you to deploy buoys during jumpspeed. Can give 1 fleet delay for free, or deploy additional buoys using droneparts.

augBlueprint.name: PRE_SCANNER
augBlueprint.title: Slip-Scanner
augBlueprint.desc: Can be used to map the next sector while in jumpspeed at the cost of 3 fuel.

augBlueprint.name: FUEL_CONSERVER
augBlueprint.title: Fuel Conserver
augBlueprint.desc: Hyper efficient fuel conservation device mixed with a bit of science mumbo-jumbo which generates up to 5 fuel cells when entering a new sector through jumpspeed.

augBlueprint.name: PDS_DISABLE
augBlueprint.title: Signal Diluter
augBlueprint.desc:
A module that drowns out distress or other signals. Can be used to prevent guards from calling for ASB backup or disable enemy attack satellites.
	
	Provides helpful blue options during relevant events.

augBlueprint.name: ANTI_VIRUS
augBlueprint.title: Anti-Virus Module
augBlueprint.desc:
Combat augment that can neutralize enemy Hacking systems. Also performs well against malicious viruses from enemy satellites or other sources.
	[Uses 2 power, lasts 30 seconds]
	
	Provides helpful blue options during relevant events.

augBlueprint.name: FLARE_DISTRACTION
augBlueprint.title: Distraction Flares
augBlueprint.desc:
A self-replenishing supply of holographic flares that make excellent distractions in situations where enemies or satellites are nearby but have not yet locked onto your vessel. Useful for sneaking into places or away from enemies.
	
	Provides helpful blue options during relevant events.

augBlueprint.name: CREW_FIREARMS
augBlueprint.title: Improved Armories
augBlueprint.desc: Outfits your crew with superior firearms, adding 30% extra damage in ranged crew combat.

augBlueprint.name: SPEED_SUITS
augBlueprint.title: Exovests
augBlueprint.desc: Increases your crew Max Health by 10%, and their movement and healing speed by 20%.

augBlueprint.name: CREW_OXYGEN
augBlueprint.title: Advanced Ventilation
augBlueprint.desc: Life Support now prioritizes your crew, refilling oxygen 65% faster in rooms where crew are present. Requires the system to be powered, and scales with power.

augBlueprint.name: CRATE_SCRAP
augBlueprint.title: Scrap Crate
augBlueprint.desc: Can be opened in the storage. Can contain anywhere from 30 to 45 scrap.

augBlueprint.name: CRATE_SCRAP_HUGE
augBlueprint.title: Huge Scrap Crate
augBlueprint.desc: Can be opened in the storage. Contains 175 scrap.

augBlueprint.name: CRATE_FUEL
augBlueprint.title: Fuel Crate
augBlueprint.desc: Can be opened in the storage. Can contain anywhere from 5 to 10 fuel.

augBlueprint.name: CRATE_MISSILES
augBlueprint.title: Ammo Crate
augBlueprint.desc: Can be opened in the storage. Can contain anywhere from 5 to 10 missiles.

augBlueprint.name: CRATE_DRONES
augBlueprint.title: Dronepart Crate
augBlueprint.desc: Can be opened in the storage. Can contain anywhere from 5 to 10 droneparts.

augBlueprint.name: PART_GATLING_AUGMENT
augBlueprint.title: Proto-PreIgniter
augBlueprint.desc: The very first Pre-Igniter ever made. Old and broken, it no longer functions as intended, but it will increase Weapons and Artillery fire rate by 12%.

augBlueprint.name: O2_MASKS
augBlueprint.title: Emergency Respirators
augBlueprint.desc: Crew take half damage from low oxygen.

augBlueprint.name: EXPLOSIVE_REPLICATOR
